headline.print_headline: Obasanjo Threatens to Withdraw From Nigerian Party
headline.main: Obasanjo Threatens to Withdraw From Nigerian Party

docs.snippet: Former Nigerian President Olusegun Obasanjo says he will "consider withdrawing" from the country's governing party until it gets rid of a top financier wanted in the U.S. for alleged drug trafficking....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former Nigerian President Olusegun Obasanjo says he will "consider withdrawing" from the country's governing party until it gets rid of a top financier wanted in the U.S. for alleged drug trafficking.

headline.print_headline: Moyes Can Smile at Last as United Sink Swansea
headline.main: Moyes Can Smile at Last as United Sink Swansea

docs.snippet: Manchester United returned to winning ways after three straight defeats with a 2-0 Premier League home victory over Swansea City on Saturday, avenging last week's FA Cup loss to the Welsh club....
docs.lead_paragraph: Manchester United returned to winning ways after three straight defeats with a 2-0 Premier League home victory over Swansea City on Saturday, avenging last week's FA Cup loss to the Welsh club.

headline.print_headline: Sunderland Can Survive Says Poyet After Win at Fulham
headline.main: Sunderland Can Survive Says Poyet After Win at Fulham

docs.snippet: Sunderland can beat the odds and stay up despite being bottom of the Premier League at Christmas, manager Gus Poyet said after an emphatic 4-1 win at fellow strugglers Fulham on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Sunderland can beat the odds and stay up despite being bottom of the Premier League at Christmas, manager Gus Poyet said after an emphatic 4-1 win at fellow strugglers Fulham on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Defoe Begins Long Goodbye From Spurs With Typical Goal
headline.main: Defoe Begins Long Goodbye From Spurs With Typical Goal

docs.snippet: England striker Jermain Defoe began his long goodbye from Tottenham Hotspur with his first Premier League goal of the season as the home side recovered from a poor first half to beat Crystal Palace 2-0 on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: England striker Jermain Defoe began his long goodbye from Tottenham Hotspur with his first Premier League goal of the season as the home side recovered from a poor first half to beat Crystal Palace 2-0 on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: David Cassidy Arrested in LA on Suspicion of DUI
headline.main: David Cassidy Arrested in LA on Suspicion of DUI

docs.snippet: Seventies heartthrob David Cassidy has been arrested in Southern California on suspicion of drunken driving....
docs.lead_paragraph: Seventies heartthrob David Cassidy has been arrested in Southern California on suspicion of drunken driving.

headline.print_headline: Rollercoaster Day as West Ham Ease Pressure on Allardyce
headline.main: Rollercoaster Day as West Ham Ease Pressure on Allardyce

docs.snippet: Struggling West Ham United relieved the pressure on manager Sam Allardyce with a much-needed 2-0 victory at Cardiff City in a rollercoaster of an English Premier League match on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Struggling West Ham United relieved the pressure on manager Sam Allardyce with a much-needed 2-0 victory at Cardiff City in a rollercoaster of an English Premier League match on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: No QB Has Manning's Playoff Experience, Heartbreak
headline.main: No QB Has Manning's Playoff Experience, Heartbreak

docs.snippet: No quarterback has been to the playoffs more than Peyton Manning or experienced more heartache there, either....
docs.lead_paragraph: No quarterback has been to the playoffs more than Peyton Manning or experienced more heartache there, either.

headline.print_headline: Hield, Spangler Lead Oklahoma Past No. 9 Iowa St.
headline.main: Hield, Spangler Lead Oklahoma Past No. 9 Iowa St.

docs.snippet: Buddy Hield scored 22 points and Ryan Spangler added 16 points and a career-high 15 rebounds to help Oklahoma knock off previously unbeaten Iowa State 87-82 Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Buddy Hield scored 22 points and Ryan Spangler added 16 points and a career-high 15 rebounds to help Oklahoma knock off previously unbeaten Iowa State 87-82 Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Indonesia's Law on Ore Exports Takes Effect
headline.main: Indonesia's Law on Ore Exports Takes Effect

docs.snippet: An Indonesian law banning the export of unprocessed minerals took effect Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: An Indonesian law banning the export of unprocessed minerals took effect Sunday.
